messages.message:
Hi Brian,

Thank you for accepting my contact request.

I visited your profile and saw that you might be a good fit for our open opportunity. We are looking for Full Stack Engineers to be based in Scottsdale, Arizona.

Let's connect and explore more about this potential career opportunity. I'm usually free for a Skype call between 8:00 AM - 2:00 PM (Manila Time). Let me know when is the best time for us to have a quick chat.

I look forward to speaking with you soon!

Regards,
Charmaine
I am a little bit overwhelmed by the responses, what company is the position for?

Hi Brian,

The company is ImportGenius, based in Arizona.

Here's an overview of the product: https://www.importgenius.com/

Let me know if you might be interested in exploring opportunities for this company.

Regards,
Charmaine
That's unbelievable. I didn't know that exists. Can you get me a phone call with their team by Friday morning?
I can talk my way in to almost anything. I just need interviews. I want to save you time. I've though about doing the same thing for every room of the house or in the manufacturing business.

Hi Brian,

It's good to know that you are interested in the role.

My next available schedule for a Skype call is on November 3, 9 AM, Manila Time.

We can have an initial conversation about the role and I'll give you more details about the next steps. Here's the specifics of the role: https://angel.co/importgenius/jobs

I'll just need a copy of your CV and your Skype for us to start with the process.

I look forward to speaking with you.

Best,
Charmaine
Sent to your email and Skype is bjcullinan
Got it! Speak to you then!

Hi Brian,

Is it possible for you to also send me a copy of your CV here in LinkedIn as attachment?

Thank you so much!
Strange, not from their mobile app. Here it is:
Thank you! I sent you the meeting request for our call on November 2, 9 AM, Manila Time. Speak to you, then!
Cool, accepted can you send me the technical details so I know what we will be talking about? What are their requirements?

Hi Brian,

Here's the job description of the role: https://angel.co/importgenius/jobs

For later's call, we'll just talk about your professional experience and motivation to join the team. Nothing too technical at this point.

Speak to you later,
Cham
